ActSpecial Appointment Regulations, No. 2003-1
PrecisAppointment of ROBERT A. WRIGHT of Ottawa, Ontario, to be Associate Secretary to the Cabinet, Deputy Minister to the Deputy Prime Minister and Security and Intelligence Coordinator, to hold office during pleasure, effective June 2, 2003.
